document_data.name: ''Champion's Battle Horn''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Champion's battle horn''''' wan a fabled [[enchanted]] [[horn]], blown by defenders of the city during the [[Siege of Neverwinter]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: When blown on a field of battle, ''champion's battle horn'' produced the sound that lifted the spirits of those who heard it, boosting their vitality, morale, and speed.
document_data.History: This horn was used by many heroes over the years. Most notably, it was used in the late 15{{th}} century DR, during the [[Cult of the Dragon]]'s Siege of Neverwinter.
